Texts.Chs: 现在的女族长是如何被选中的完全是未知的，因为女人们永远不会告诉像我这样的男人她们最私密的姐妹关系是如何运作的。他们只说她是道路，是向导，她的道路是真正的道路。通过她，他们是一体。只要向她宣誓效忠，陋居就是安全的。
Texts.Eng: How the current Matriarch is chosen is completely unknown, as the women would never tell a male such as myself how their most private sisterhood operates. They speak only that she is the Word, and the Guide, and that Her way is the true path. Through She, they are One. So long as ones fealty is sworn to Her the Burrow is safe.

Texts.Chs: 更具体地说，从她，伟大的女族长，阿瓦曼达拉，道路的女主人... 她的统治被赐予很多名字。女人是唯一被允许谈论她的人，甚至是提到她的人。这样做的男性必须通过称作交锋仪式性的战斗得到净化，一种从刀刃到战士的能量转移。
Texts.Eng: More specifically, from She, the Great Matriarch, Avemnedara, Mistress of the Way...many names are given to She that Rules. The womenfolk are the only ones permitted to speak of her, or even refer to her. Males who do so must be cleansed through ritual combat followed by Conshak, a 'transfer of energy' from blade to warrior.

Texts.Chs: 我最近发现了夜族人的秘密，尽管我为了获得足够的信任而奋斗了将近20年，我还是选择了记录这些信息以便保存。这将有利于我们所有人更好地了解这种谜一般的人。
Texts.Eng: There are mysteries to the Nightar I have recently discovered, though I fought tooth and nail for nearly twenty years to even gain enough trust to ask I have elected to mark down the information for preservation. It will benefit us all to better understand this enigmatic people.

Texts.Chs: 我们这些非夜行者经常想知道，为什么赫普塔奇，尽管被公开称为他们的领袖，却与领土争端、经济、贸易或立法毫无关系...或者任何真正的要求来维持平民的生活？实际上，赫普塔奇只是他们的军事领袖。夜族真正的政治引力来自于女性。
Texts.Eng: We non-Nightar have often wondered why the Heptarch, despite being publically referred to as their leader, has nothing whatsoever to do with territorial disputes, economics, trade or lawmaking...or any true requirements to keep a civiliation going? The Heptarch is, in all actuality, their military leader only. The true political pull among the Nightar comes from the females.
